title: Game play issue with the new client
body:
Hi guys, is it me or does the new client actually lag up the game a little more? My ping was at a steady 63ms and it felt like I was playing at around 180ms due to some unknown packet drops. Does the new client affect gameplay?

EDIT: This is happening on both clients so it's not a client problem, seems like some movement commands aren't registering, can anyone tell me a fix?

replies.body:
Packet loss can be caused by a handful of factors, however, the most common causes are issues either on your local network or along your network routing. I strongly recommend working through [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this caused any change.
